columns.name: _createdAtLocation
columns.description: Location of the document; e.g. location where the document was emitted

columns.name: _referenceForObjects
columns.description: References to the LogisticsObjects referring to this external reference

columns.name: _checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: _checksum
columns.description: Checksum of the document to validate its integrity

columns.name: _documentLink
columns.description: Link to the document; e.g. URL of the file where it is hosted

columns.name: _documentName
columns.description: If no DocumentType provided; name of the referenced document

columns.name: _documentType
columns.description: Type of the referenced document . Can refer UNEDIFACT 11  e.g. 74 - Air Waybill; but not limited to

columns.name: _validFrom
columns.description: Validity start date based on usage context

columns.name: _validUntil
columns.description: Validity end date (date of expiry) based on usage context

columns.name: _skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object
